title: News reports from France. [No. 72/81] = Chroniques de France
brief_description: Cinemagazine: 1. 12 years of contemporary art in France - 1972, a balance sheet of 12 years of artistic creation. 2. Roland Barthes, as seen by himself - Professor and Man of Letters, creator of the science of semiology. 3. The Alcazar - Reliving the “mad years” in a recreated Parisian Concert-Cafe.
